The Get design pages API now returns page dimensions for pages in bounded designs (unbounded designs like whiteboards and Canva Docs will not have pag
summary: The Get design pages API now returns page dimensions for pages in bounded designs (unbounded designs like whiteboards and Canva Docs will not have page dimensions).

title: The Get design export formats API is no longer in preview, and is now generally available.
The List brand templates API now supports an optional limit parameter to control the number of brand templates returned per request.
The List folder items API now supports a limit parameter to control the number of folder items returned per request.
The List designs API now supports a limit parameter to control the number of designs returned per request.

title: Announcing the Slack MCP server and Real-time Search API
summary: We're excited to announce the release of not one, but two, major components designed to significantly enhance how Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI agents interact with your workspace data: the Slack Model Context Protocol (MCP) server and the Real-time Search (RTS) API!

title: Retry delayed events feature now available
summary: You can now replay events that your app might have missed! In case of an outage where your app may have missed events, we've released a Delayed Events feature that lets you replay past events. Read all about it in the Events API docs.
